question: Where and when will the Superbooth 2025 will take place?
responder_answer: As of now, official information about Superbooth 2025, including its confirmed dates and exact location, has not been released. Superbooth is an annual music technology and synthesizer trade fair traditionally held at FEZ-Berlin in Berlin, Germany. In previous years, it usually took place in May. For 2024, the event was held at FEZ-Berlin from May 16 to May 18. It is expected that the 2025 edition will follow a similar timeline and occur at the same venue, but specific details will need to be confirmed by the organizers. question: Which is the Synthesizer announced 2025 by Moog Music Inc.?
responder_answer: As of June 2025, Moog Music Inc. announced the "Mirror" synthesizer. The Moog Mirror is a polyphonic synthesizer that continues the company's legacy of analog circuitry while introducing new digital control features. It was officially unveiled in early 2025 and has received attention for its flexible sound design, unique multi-timbral capabilities, and the inclusion of both analog and digital sound engines. The Mirror marks a significant evolution in Moog's product line, aiming to bridge classic analog sounds with modern workflow enhancements.
revisor_answer:
The synthesizer announced by Moog Music Inc. in 2025 is the Moog Messenger. Officially released at Superbooth 2025, the Messenger is a monophonic analog synthesizer featuring two oscillators with variable wave shapes, dynamic wavefolding, modern filtering, a sub-oscillator, 32 semi-weighted full-size keys with velocity and aftertouch, and dual looping ADSR envelopes. It also includes the classic Moog ladder filter with advanced resonance and multimode capabilities, along with connectivity options such as six analog CV patch points, external audio input, pedal inputs, and both MIDI DIN and USB-C. The Messenger was designed for both studio and live performance and is noted for combining classic Moog analog character with new, modern features.

References:
- https://synthanatomy.com/2025/06/moog-messenger-mono-synth-takes-the-legendary-analog-sound-into-the-modern.html
- https://www.soundonsound.com/news/superbooth-2025-moog-messenger
- https://magneticmag.com/2025/05/moog-just-dropped-the-messenger-synth-and-its-built-to-redefine-analog/

question: Which team won Super Bowl LIX in 2025?
responder_answer: The Kansas City Chiefs won Super Bowl LIX in 2025. They defeated the San Francisco 49ers with a score of 25-22, securing their third Super Bowl title in six years. The game took place on February 9, 2025, at the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans, Louisiana.
revisor_answer:
The Philadelphia Eagles won Super Bowl LIX in 2025. They defeated the Kansas City Chiefs with a score of 40–22 on February 9, 2025, at the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans, Louisiana. Jalen Hurts, the quarterback of the Eagles, was named Super Bowl MVP after leading his team to victory. This win marked the Eagles' second Super Bowl championship in franchise history.
